general.gigTitle: build responsive website and do custom development

sellerCard.description:
At Code Capital, we have experience and the expertise to help small, medium, and corporate-level businesses build a strong online presence and attract their dream customer base with our uniquely effective, innovative Web Design & Development services.

Using our creative minds, years of technical capabilities, and passion for applying top-notch UI/UX practices, we specialize in offering a complete end-to-end solution – from wireframes to the final product and everything in between. We've helped create dozens of tailored software solutions to date, and we can't wait to do the same for you.

description.content:
Hey, thank you so much for visiting my gig, I would be really happy to work with you!


Why Me?

I focus on listening & understanding your needs, requirements and developing reliable and outstanding solution.

Web Development is my passion and I will leave no stone unturned in producing a masterpiece for you. I work with a focus on Quality, Aesthetics, and Professionalism.


What you will get in this gig:

  • A complete website
  • User-friendly clean, modern and attractive Web Design
  • Well organized and w3C Validated code
  • SEO Optimization
  • Mobile friendly design
  • Cross-Browser Compatibility
  • Highly Focus on user-experience and usability goals
  • Support Service
  • Social Media Integration, Google Maps, Contact Forms


Custom Development:

I also offer complete custom coded websites in Core PHP, Laravel, MySQL, MongoDB. please contact me to discuss the details.


I am eager to help you out in your next digital adventure, lets discuss and develop something great!

There is much more which I offer but can't be covered here so; Feel Free to contact.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you do develop custom-coded websites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I build complete websites including back-end coding and databases. We can discuss your requirements and prepare a comprehensive development plan for your project.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don’t have the content for my website yet, can you start developing the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, if you don't have the content at the moment, we can use dummy content that you can ask to replace with your actual content later.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can i contact you before placing order to discuss my project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of course, don't hesitate, feel free to contact me. I will be happy to assist you

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I do not like any feature of my website? Will you make revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: In case there is any issue, please contact me within 12 days of the delivery. I will try to resolve ASAP. I cannot accept responsibility, if contacted with any issue after weeks, months or years!! Please note that I will make revisions free of cost if contacted within 12 days of delivery.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What about site progress revisions and modifications?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: After placing the order I will start working on it, I'll keep updating you with the progress. Yes! you can ask for unlimited revisions. Once we get done with all changes. I will shift the website to your domain and hosting.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide maintenance services for the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes I do provide maintenance services.

packageList.title: Basic
packageList.description: One page responsive website with slider, 4 Sections, Contact form, Map, Social Media integration.

packageList.title: Standard
packageList.description: Basic package + up to 4 informational pages + security

packageList.title: PREMIUM
packageList.description: Standard package + eCommerce + Payment gateway integration + SEO optimized code Custom functionality

openGraph.title: build responsive website and do custom development

reviews.comment:
I literally have not enough words to describe Codecapital team and their work. They are the best out there. They provided everything I asked for in such a short period of time. Every single request was approved and done perfectly. There's never a "no" or "but" or any type of situation where the team can't deliver. They are on top their game, they are nice, friendly and very reactive.
It's the 3rd time I'm using the team and I'm still so amazed about how amazing they are. 
Don't look anywhere else, Codecapital is the number 1 team!!

I mean were do I begin? Flat-out phenomenal experience with Shahab and his team. Every part from beginning to end was one of the best entrepreneurial experiences of my life. They built me an absolute beautiful and efficient state of the art website from scratch, and they were very Intune with what I wanted, and needed and how we can take it to another level. They far exceeded my expectations, and words can't describe how appreciative I am of all their help and skillset.

Working with Ahmed and Code Capital was an incredible experience. They built me an amazing looking website ready and easy to use within a couple of months. They helped me with everything I asked, they went above and beyond to create the website I asked. Even tho I wasn't too sure about what to, with their expertise and experience they guided me through every single steps. Ahmed was in touch with me very often and and was always available when I needed him. Easy to talk to, we understood each other and was very nice during the whole process.
I'm very happy with the team and very happy with what they did for me. 
I highly highly recommend to work with Code Capital if you need a new website or anything they do because they are amazing.
I will always work with them!!!

Codecapital is the only team I work with and everytime they keep proving me why I never go anywhere else.
Hard workers, great listeners, always available and understand there are deadlines so they will do the extra work.
My website juste keeps getting better and better

Codecapital truly IMPRESSED with their exceptional professionalism and expertise in website development! The quality of their work went above and beyond what I expected, and collaborating with them was a breeze thanks to their cooperative nature and quick responsiveness. Highly RECOMMEND! 👍
